name: 尹世洵
objective: 使學生了解基本結構元素受震動時的反應，授課內容包括單自由度系統(運動方程式、自由震盪反應、諧和荷重反應、週期荷重反應、衝擊荷重反應等)多自由度系統(結構性質矩陣之估算、無阻尼自由震盪、振態分析、實際荷重反應等)。
schedule:
1.Fundamentals of Vibration
2.Free Vibrations of Single-DOF Systems
3.Harmonically Excited Vibrations of Single-DOF Systems
4.Generally Forced Vibrations of Single-DOF Systems
5.Vibrations of Multi-DOF Systems
7.Numerical Methods
6.Vibration Measurement and Control
scorePolicy: Midterm and final exams (33% each), Problem sets(33%)
materials:
”Mechanical Vibrations”,S. S .Rao,Addison-Wesley
”Engineering Vibration” D. J. Inman,Prentice-Hall
”Dynamics of Structures” A. K. Chopra, Prentice-Hall
